value.title: Plan and implement privileged access
value.excerpt: Plan and implement privileged access

value.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery
value.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your Azure infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of Azure virtual machines with Azure Site Recovery.

value.title: Provision an Azure SQL database to store application data
value.excerpt: Find out what makes Azure SQL Database a good choice for your relational database, how to create the database from the portal and connect with Azure Cloud Shell.

value.title: Manage software delivery by using a release based workflow on GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to implement a release based workflow on GitHub using project boards, branches, and releases.

value.title: Run Cognitive Services on IoT Edge
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Introduction to securing data at rest on Azure
value.excerpt: Identify the data in your organization and store it on Azure. Store secrets securely, and use client-side encryption and Storage Service Encryption to help protect your data.

value.title: Use containers for your Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) Apps
value.excerpt: The Language Understanding (LUIS) container loads your trained or published Language Understanding model. As a LUIS app, the docker container provides access to the query predictions from the container's API endpoints

value.excerpt: Jeff Hollan joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can build highly scalable serverless APIs with Azure Functions.  0:00 – Overview 1:09 – What "serverless" really means 4:00 – A closer look at Azure Functions 7:29 – Azure Functions Live Metrics 10:45 – Thinking downstream of Azure Functions 13:52 – Using

value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to create web apps using the Azure App service in the Azure portal. value.title: How to create, host, and share packages with Azure Artifacts | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure Artifacts, an Azure DevOps service, to set up a feed for sharing packages with your team.    For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips   Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account

value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to set up staging environments in Azure App Service by using deployment slots. value.title: Build the intelligent edge with Azure IoT Edge
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of building IoT solutions with Azure IoT.

topItems.title: Deploy a pre-built module to the Edge device
Set up an IoT Edge Gateway
topItems.excerpt: This module is theoretical and will walk you through how an IoT Edge device can be used as a gateway.

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: With this learning path, you'll use Azure Data Lake Storage to process your Big Data efficiently and easily while also being protected by Azure’s host of security features.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Discover how Data Lake Storage provides a repository where you can upload and store unstructured data bringing new efficiencies to processing big data analytics.

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn about creating an Azure Data Lake Storage account and uploading data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2 through the Azure Storage Explorer.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Use basketball stats to optimize game play with Visual Studio Code, inspired by SPACE JAM: A NEW LEGACY
value.excerpt: This *Space Jam: A New Legacy* - inspired learning path aims to equip you with data science, web development skills, and coding strategies to impact a game of basketball in real time, ensuring victory for the Tune Squad in their next game.

topItems.title: Create a web app that uses data to make decisions on the basketball court
topItems.excerpt: Create a web app by using JavaScript, Azure, GitHub, and Visual Studio Code to help the Tune Squad coach use data to make decisions on the basketball court, inspired by SPACE JAM: A NEW LEGACY.

topItems.title: Build an AI web app by using Python and Flask
topItems.excerpt: Use Python, Flask, and Azure Cognitive Services to build a web app that incorporates AI

value.title: Assess your existing software development process
value.excerpt: Find out how to assess efficiency with a value stream map to help you examine your existing release processes and technologies.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
value.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

value.title: Back up and restore your Azure SQL database
value.excerpt: Protect the data in your Azure SQL database and recover from data loss or corruption with backup and restore.

value.title: Build and run a web application with the MEAN stack on an Azure Linux virtual machine
value.excerpt: Learn how to decide if the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, AngularJS, and Node.js) is a good choice for you and set up a MEAN-based web application on a new Azure Linux virtual machine.

value.title: Caching and performance in Azure storage disks
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure VM disk performance and how to enable caching to help optimize read and write access to storage.

value.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

value.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Communicate effectively on GitHub by using Markdown
value.excerpt: Learn to use Markdown to communicate with brevity, clarity, and expression.

value.title: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault

value.title: Configure security policies to manage data
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up policies to classify, retain, and protect your cloud-based data.

value.title: Control authentication for your APIs with Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Discover how to protect your APIs from unauthorized use with API keys and client certificate authentication.

value.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

value.title: Introduction to Azure Database for PostgreSQL
value.excerpt: This module is a no-code introduction to PostgreSQL on Azure, including an explanation of particular problems that using Azure Database for PostgreSQL can solve. At a high level, we show how the components fit together and identify situations where you should use Azure Database for PostgreSQL.

value.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale
value.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Cosmos DB account, database, and container built to scale as your application grows.
